Articles.Content:
i can no longer double right click and click loop , am i the only one having problems like this with you tube "new look"?

p.s help.

~crunch~

el psy congroo

You might've had a browser extension installed, I've never been able to do that.

But be prepared to be ticked at google for years to come. I've been on youtube for a good long while and they've changed a lot. Though this recent one is the most I've seen it change in one update.
